Ok all u have to do htis the following…make a lev 3 acount and take ur frined to a place were no one gose…make sure u are no ur lev 3 …then type in a swear words such as…you mother fucking bitch…keep saying that for 35 minits tell ur frined to report u every 1min for 35 mins… log out and tll him check hi messages he should have a message in there from jagex tell him to exept…

item.title: How can i make my friend a mod?
item.dc:creator: @xiokiller xiokiller
item.description:
@xiokiller wrote:

[quote=“DAWIGG, post:2, topic:20990”]ok go to client.java,search for admin list, then go down a lil bit and you will see a list of names, take out 1 of those names and put his.[/quote]u better remove all names…, and fill in ur name and the on of the friend else other people wo know those names are admin or mod:P

testscape source:
go to client.java thats ur cleint text file:P
press: ctrl+f
fill in the search screen “moderator”
and there u go
owner right: 3
admin: 2
mod: 1
